entry.title: Transformers
entry.summary:
title: Transformers date: 2024-01-02 12:00:00 categories:[AI, Text Processing] tags: [ML, AI, GenAI] —
Text Generation with Transformers: Fine-Tuning for Specific Tasks
Transformers have revolutionized Natural Language Processing (NLP), achieving state-of-the-art results in various tasks, including text generation. Unlike recurrent neural networks (RNNs), transformers process entire sequenc...
